resources.string:
You are using Olvid for Android
Version %1$s (build %2$d)

Server API: %3$d
Engine DB schema: %4$d
Application DB schema: %5$d
App running for: %6$s

You are using Olvid for Android
Version %1$s (build %2$d)

Server API: %3$d
Engine DB schema: %4$d
Application DB schema: %5$d

Extra features: %6$s
App running for: %7$s
Do you want to introduce %1$s and %2$s to one another?
Do you want to introduce %1$s to the %2$d following contacts?\n\n%3$s
Do you really want to delete attachment %1$s from this message?\nThis action cannot be undone.
Do you really want to delete attachment %1$s?\nThis action cannot be undone.
Do you wish to disband the group %1$s?\nIt will no longer be possible to send messages to this group. Existing group messages will not be affected.

You are about to disband the group %1$s.
This will remove all members and pending members from the group. There are currently:
- %2$d members
- %3$d pending members

Proceed with disbanding this group?
Do you want to exchange codes with %1$s to re-validate their identity?
Do you wish to send %1$s a new invitation to join the group %2$s?
You are about to leave the group %1$s. Other members of the group will be notified and you will stop receiving messages sent to this group.\n\nDo you really want to leave the group?

The secure channels between you and your contact might become de-synchronized. If you notice that messages you send are no longer received by your contact, recreating the secure channels could correct this.\n\nDo you wish to initiate the recreation of secure channels?
Do you really wish to restart the ongoing secure discussion channel establishment protocol?
Do you really wish to abort?
Please enter a name which will be displayed to your contacts. These details will never be sent to Olvid\'s servers.
Press the blue + below to add your first contact.
Contact and group discussions will appear here.
Press \"New group\" to create your first group.
The group manager updated the Group Card. Both the old and new versions are shown below.\n\nPress \"update\" to update the group\'s information.
One of the group administrators updated the group details. The new version is shown above.\n\nPress \"update\" to use this new version.
Your contact updated their Olvid Card. Both the old and new versions are shown below.\n\nPress \"update\" to update your contact\'s information with this new version.

A secure discussion channel is currently being established. You cannot start any discussion with this contact until this is done. This process should take a few seconds if both you and your contact are online.\n\nIf you believe that something went wrong, you can restart the channel establishment.
%1$s would like to discuss with you
This invitation comes from an unknown user. It is recommended to ignore it.
If you ignore this invitation, %1$s will not be notified.
%1$s wants to introduce you to %2$s. Accept?
An unknown contact wants to introduce you to %1$s. It is recommended to reject this invitation?
To get in contact with %1$s communicate them your code and enter their\'s.
We\'re almost there! Communicate your code to %1$s.
Your code and that of %1$s will soon be available.
Please wait for %1$s to accept to discuss with you.
Waiting for %1$s to accept the introduction from %2$s.
Waiting for %1$s to accept the introduction.
Not part of a group yet
Your messages will be automatically sent once a secure channel is established for this discussion. Until then, they will remain on hold.
Please fill in a first or a last name
%1$s wants to discuss with you on Olvid. To accept, use the link below:\n\n%2$s
%1$s invites you to a group discussion
Choose how to send your invitation
Some files could not be attached to the message due to a bug in your Android version (multiple files returned the same URI). Please try again to attach missing files.
An attachment is still being processed. Your message will be sent when processing ends.
Permission to use camera was denied
The channel establishment protocol failed to restart
The channel establishment protocol was successfully restarted
Your device does not have a camera
Contact introduction requires an established secure channel
The file you selected could not be attached to the message
The file %1$s could not be attached to the message
The file %1$s is already attached to the message
Your message is on hold and will be sent as soon as possible
Shortcut creation not supported on your device
Unable to find a suitable application to open this file type
%2$s - Validation by the identity provider at %1$s
You are about to remove %1$s from your list of other users.\n\nReally delete this user?

Battery optimization on Android works by delaying certain background events to run them in a batch. This may delay the reception of inbound Olvid messages.\n\nTo ensure that your messages are received promptly, you should allow Olvid to \"always run in background\". Press \"Settings\" below and then \"Allow\".
Do not show this message again
Messages posted in this discussion are protected using end-to-end encryption.\nTheir confidentiality, their authenticity, and the identity of their sender are guaranteed through cryptography.
An unknown member joined the group
An unknown member left the group
Restore dialogs hidden by \"do not show this message again\"
When this is on, people are notified when you have read their messages. This can be overridden in each discussion.
Attach a preview of links you send
Once activated, Olvid will fetch a preview of links you send and attach it to the message.
Once activated, Olvid will automatically fetch previews of links you receive (if a preview is not attached to the message).
Turn this on to protect Olvid with a lock screen at startup.
When this is on, Olvid can be unlocked using the default biometric authentication method of your device.
Modify the PIN code used to unlock Olvid.
When this is on, all notifications are replaced by \"Olvid requires your attention\".
Use a password instead of a PIN
Use a PIN instead of a password
You will need to enter this PIN to unlock Olvid.\nIt can\'t be recovered and you may lose access to your Olvid data if you forget it.
Before you can proceed, you must enter the current PIN.
Enable this to remove any mention of Olvid and the Olvid logo from the lock screen
Delay before locking Olvid when it goes in the background
Biometric authentication not yet configured on your device.
Only show a notification when Olvid is unlocked.
Always show Olvid\'s lock status in a notification.
Verify or re-generate a backup key
Click to export an encrypted backup file to your device.
Click to export an encrypted backup file to your device.\nLatest export: %1$s
When this is on, Olvid will periodically upload an encrypted backup to the cloud.
Backup key generated: %1$s\nNumber of key verifications: %2$d\nLatest key verification: %3$s
Backup key generated: %1$s\nKey was never verified.
Failed to generate a new backup key. Please try again.

The backup key below will be used to encrypt all your Olvid backups. Please keep it in a safe place.\nOlvid will periodically check you are able to enter this key to ensure you do not lose access to your backups.
This is the only time this key will be displayed. If you lose it, you will need to generate a new one.
Failed to save backup. Please try again.
Unable to open selected backup file. Please try again.
XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX
Backup key verification failed.\nPlease check that you entered the correct key.
Backup key verification failed.\nThe key you entered is too short.
Backup key verification failed.\nThe key you entered is too long.
Are you sure you want to generate a new backup key?\n\nIf so, please make sure you are ready to write down this new key as it will be used for all future backups.
Failed to create backup file. Please try again.

Your profile has been deactivated on this device.

Olvid was not able to retrieve the list of devices on which it is currently active. Reactivating your profile on this device could deactivate it on another one.

If you wish to proceed, press "reactivate my profile on this device" below. Keep in mind that using Olvid to receive and send messages on two devices simultaneously requires a license.

Press "cancel" to dismiss this dialog and keep this device inactive: you will not be able to send or receive messages on this device, but may still browse your old discussions.

Your profile has been deactivated on this device.

It appears you have a license to use Olvid on multiple devices simultaneously, so you may reactivate your profile whenever you want. For you information, below is the list of your current active devices.

If you wish to proceed, press "reactivate my profile on this device" below. Your device will then synchronize with your other active devices to update your contacts and groups.

Press "cancel" to dismiss this dialog and keep this device inactive: you will not be able to send or receive messages on this device, but may still browse your old discussions.

Your profile has been deactivated on this device.

It appears you do not have any active device at the moment, so you may reactivate your profile whenever you want.

If you wish to proceed, press "reactivate my profile on this device" below.

Press "cancel" to dismiss this dialog and keep this device inactive: you will not be able to send or receive messages on this device, but may still browse your old discussions.

Your profile has been deactivated on this device.

It appears you do not have a license to use Olvid on multiple devices simultaneously. Reactivating this device requires to deactivate another of your devices.

If you wish to proceed, select the device you wish to deactivate from the list below, then press "reactivate my profile on this device".

Press "cancel" to dismiss this dialog and keep this device inactive: you will not be able to send or receive messages on this device, but may still browse your old discussions.

Your profile has been deactivated on this device.

It appears all your other devices are set to be deactivated in the near future, so you may reactivate your profile on this device whenever you want. For you information, below is the list of your current active devices.

If you wish to proceed, press "reactivate my profile on this device" below.

Press "cancel" to dismiss this dialog and keep this device inactive: you will not be able to send or receive messages on this device, but may still browse your old discussions.
Reactivate my profile on this device
An error occurred. Please try again.
Your Olvid ID has been reactivated on this device.\n\nSecure channels are now being recreated with all your contacts.
An error occurred while selecting a cloud provider account
Error, no Olvid backup was found
Error while searching for a backup

In order to restore an Olvid backup from the cloud, you will need to select the Google Drive account on which the encrypted backup has been saved and grant Olvid the permission to access this file.\n\nOlvid will not have access to any of your other files on Google Drive
When this is on, Olvid will instruct compatible keyboards to use \"incognito mode\"
Failed to download selected backup. Please try again
Failed to delete selected backup. Please try again

Are you sure you wish to reactivate your Olvid profile on this device?\n\nThis will deactivate it on your other device \"%1$s\". This will not allow you to receive messages on both devices simultaneously.
Are you sure you wish to reactivate your Olvid profile on this device?
Are you sure you wish to reactivate your Olvid profile on this device?\n\nIf you have other active devices, this could deactivate another one of them.
When this is on, screenshots are disabled in Olvid and in the recent apps list.
You generated a new backup key. This is probably the right moment to export a backup to a file, or to activate automatic backups to the cloud.
You have not selected any contact to add to your group. Are you sure you want to create an empty group?
Enable dark mode to save your battery and your eyes.
You are already in a call. End it before starting a new one.
When activated, you won\'t be notified of new messages in this discussion.
Calls you make or receive will appear here.
Are you sure you want to remove all entries from your call log?
Permission to record audio was denied
Call failed - Call initiation not permitted
New biometric enrollment detected\nPlease authenticate with your PIN
New biometric enrollment detected\nPlease authenticate with your password
When enabled, logcat will include debug level logs for Olvid.
Do you really wish to exclude %1$s from this call?
You were excluded from this call
This subscription is already associated to another user
Send and receive messages and attachments
When activated, Olvid will attempt to remove sensitive metadata from imported photo files.\nThis includes GPS data, camera make, creation date…
Scanning the ID of another user allows you to invite them.
Please enter the PIN code displayed in your web browser
Creating a secure connection between your App and the WebClient…
Close current connection and start a new one?
Automatically send message when hitting Enter key.
Show a pop-up notification on browser when receiving a new message.
Enable notification sound in WebClient to be alerted of incoming messages.
Keep WebClient running as background task
Keep WebClient connection alive even if App is killed.
Show a notification on App when there is an error.
Activity detected in WebClient after an extended period of inactivity
Receive a notification in case of activity after 10 minutes of inactivity.
Sharing your ID allows another Olvid user to invite you.
%1$s is already part of your contacts. Adding them again will allow you to re-verify their identity.
Failed to add contact, please try again
You cannot add your own Olvid ID to your contacts!
This license is for another Olvid server.
Malformed license activation link.\n\nPlease contact the person who sent you this link.
Please contact the person who sent you this link.
Premium features available for free until: %1$s
Try Olvid\'s secure calls for free for one month (only available once)
To keep your subscription to Olvid, please update your payment method
Initiating secure phone calls with Olvid requires a subscription.\n\nYou can check your current subscription status and see available subscription plans on the \"My Profile\" page.
Connecting to the Olvid web client requires a subscription.\n\nYou can check your current subscription status and see available subscription plans on the \"My Profile\" page.

Using your Olvid profile on multiple devices at the same time requires a subscription.\n\nYou can check your current subscription status and see available subscription plans on the \"My Profile\" page.
Maintain a list of recent discussions
When this is on, Olvid will maintain a list of recent discussions and expose it to your Android system. This can make direct sharing with Olvid faster, but may expose the name of your contacts.
On, view messages when opening the discussion
Off, never retain wiped messages, delete them
On, retain wiped messages to see when they are delivered or read
When activated, read once messages and messages with the default limited visibility duration are opened as soon as you enter the discussion. Otherwise, a click is required.
When activated, wiped outbound messages are retained so you can see when they are delivered or read. Otherwise, they are deleted.
The settings below are shared between all participants in this discussion. Changing them will affect the default visibility and existence duration of messages sent by all participants.

The settings below are shared between all participants in this discussion. Changing them will affect the default visibility and existence duration of messages sent by all participants.\n\nYou do not have the permission to modify these settings.
When activated, messages and attachments are displayed once, and are deleted when exiting the discussion.
Who can \"delete everywhere\" messages from other users?
Once read, messages are visible for: %1$s

You have modified the default ephemeral message settings for this discussion.\n\nDo you want to update these settings for you and all other discussion participants, or do you want to discard your changes?
You updated the discussion shared settings
The settings below allow you to automatically delete old messages in your discussions. They can be overridden in each discussion.
The settings below are applied by default to any new discussion you create. They will be shared with other participants in this discussion.
Enter the number of messages to keep in each discussion. Leave blank to keep all messages.\n\nUnread messages are never deleted.

Enter the number of messages to keep in this discussion.
Leave blank to use your default policy (keep all messages).

Unread messages are never deleted.

Enter the number of messages to keep in this discussion.
Leave blank to use your default policy (keep latest %1$d messages).
Enter 0 to keep all messages.

Unread messages are never deleted.
The settings below allow you to automatically delete old messages in this discussion. They have priority over your default retention policy.
Before recording voice messages, please grant Olvid the permission to record audio.

Before recording voice messages, Olvid requires the permission to record audio.\n\nIt appears that this permission has been permanently denied to Olvid. You should open the App Settings to manually grant this permission.
Play/pause controls when playing media in Olvid
Unable to delete everywhere. Please try again.
New message notifications are currently muted.\n\nDo you want to unmute them?
New message notifications are muted until: %1$s.\n\nDo you want to unmute them?
Choose which regional TURN servers to use
This screen lets you choose additional options for the creation of your Olvid ID. You can enter the options manually or scan a configuration QR-code.
A newer version of Olvid is available from Google Play.\n\nPlease update to take advantage of the newest features.
It seems your Olvid server does not support secure call initiation.\n\nPlease contact your administrator for more information.

This screen lets you to configure your company\'s identity provider in Olvid. Once configured, you can authenticate with this server and Olvid will let you to seamlessly add other employees to your contacts.\nPlease contact your administrator for more details.
Unable to retrieve identity details from provider. Please try again.
Unable to connect to server. Please try again.
The name below was retrieved from your company\'s identity provider and can\'t be changed. You may still choose a profile picture. These details will never be sent to Olvid\'s servers.
Your Olvid ID is managed by your company\'s identity provider. You need to re-authenticate with this identity provider to continue.
Another Olvid ID is associated with your account on your company\'s identity provider. If you generated a new ID you need to replace the previous one.
Failed to replace previous Olvid ID, please try again

You Olvid ID is managed by your company\'s identity provider. It seems you authenticated as a different user than usual. This is not supported.\n\nPlease contact your administrator or re-authenticate as the correct user.
Your Olvid ID is managed by your company\'s identity provider.\n\nYou can easily add contacts inside your company by using the search field above and digging into its user directory.
You selected to add %1$s to your contacts. Do you want to proceed?

You are about to configure your company\'s identity provider in Olvid. Once configured, you can authenticate with this server and Olvid will let you to seamlessly add other employees to your contacts.\nPlease contact your administrator for more details.

Olvid is already configured to use a DIFFERENT identity provider. If your company indeed changed identity provider, you can proceed by authenticating with this new provider. If in doubt, simply cancel.\nPlease contact your administrator for more details.
Olvid is already configured with your company\'s identity provider.\nPlease contact your administrator for more details.
Unable to connect to your company\'s identity provider. Please check your internet connection or contact your administrator for more details.
Unable to configure your company\'s identity provider with your current Olvid ID. Your ID was generated on a different Olvid server.\nPlease contact your administrator for more details.

Unable to configure your company\'s identity provider. Your version of Olvid is outdated and is not compatible with your company\'s identity provider.\nPlease update Olvid and try again, or contact your administrator for more details.
The name below was retrieved from your company\'s identity provider.\nOnce your Olvid ID is managed by your this provider, this is how your contacts will see you in Olvid.
Successfully switched to a managed ID
Failed to switch to a managed ID

Your Olvid ID is currently managed by your company's identity provider. You are about to switch to a normal, un-managed, Olvid ID.

If you proceed, you will no longer be able to seamlessly add contacts from your company to Olvid. Please contact your administrator for more details.

Do you wish to proceed?
Your Olvid ID is currently managed by your company\'s identity provider which restricts transfers. It can not be removed at your initiative.\n\nPlease contact your administrator for more details.

Your identity provider indicates that an Olvid ID is already associated to the user you signed in as. If you proceed, this Olvid ID will be revoked and your new one will be associated to this user.\nPlease contact your administrator for more details.

Your identity provider indicates that an Olvid ID is already associated to the user you signed in as. You cannot proceed with the creation of your ID.\n\nPlease contact your administrator for more details.
Your identity provider indicates that an Olvid ID is already associated to the user you signed in as. You cannot proceed with the configuration.\n\nPlease contact your administrator for more details.
Olvid was unable to upload your Olvid ID to your company\'s identity provider. It will be retried in the background.
Your identity provider indicates that a different Olvid ID is associated to the user you signed in as and you do not have permission to update it.\nPlease contact your administrator for more details.
Your Olvid ID is currently managed by your company\'s identity provider. You cannot manually activate an Olvid license.\n\nPlease contact your administrator for more details.

Olvid is unable to use the message notification sound you selected. It was deactivated. A bug in Android 9 prevents the use of custom notification sounds to apps that do not request access to external storage/SD card.\n\nYou should try selecting a standard notification sound. Until then, your notifications will remain silent!
Exporting app databases allows you to inspect exactly what Olvid stores internally.\nWarning: these databases contain all your sensitive information and should be kept in a safe place!

By clicking export, Olvid will generate a zip file containing the databases of both the engine and the application itself. You will be prompted to select where to save this zip file.\n\n**Warning: these databases contain all your sensitive information and should be kept in a safe place!**
Error exporting app databases. Please try again.
When active, your contact list is sorted by last name. Otherwise, the first name is used.
Display the last name of your contacts in uppercase
Explore the internal storage of your Olvid application!
Security check\nUnlock Olvid to connect to the web client
When this security feature is active, connecting to the webclient will require to unlock Olvid.

If you disable push notifications you will not be notified of new messages when Olvid is in the background. Keep in mind that Olvid never sends any data in these push notifications: the only information Google gets from them is that you received a message in Olvid.
When activated, Olvid will maintain a permanent connection to its server. This can improve message reception speed and reliability, but it may drain your battery.
Use low bandwidth during audio calls
When activated, the bandwidth used during calls will be reduced. This may reduce sound quality but can improve connection stability.

If you only disable Google push notifications, you will not be notified instantly of new messages.\n\nYou may instead want to enable a permanent WebSocket connection to Olvid\'s servers that can serve the same purpose (but may drain your battery).
Having a foreground service prevents Olvid from being stopped by the system. A small icon is displayed in your notifications area and can be hidden in the system preferences.
Share app and OS version with Olvid
When activated, your app will share its version and the version of your OS (and nothing more) with the Olvid servers. This data is extremely valuable when rolling-out new features.
Notify when a server certificate changes
When activated, Olvid will notify you every time the SSL/TLS certificate of one of the servers it connects to changes.
The SSL/TLS certificate of the server below changed and you have not yet agreed to trust it.
You do not trust any certificate for this server yet.
It seems the issuer of the server certificate changed for this new certificate. Please check the issuer chains below for any unexpected change.
The issuer of this certificate has not changed. This is probably only the certificate being renewed. Please check the expiration dates below to make sure a renewal was to be expected.

Your device is running low on available space. Expect to run into unexpected errors when receiving or sending files with Olvid.\n\nThis is probably the right time to free up some space on your device.
When activated, clicking an image attachment will open it in the internal viewer. Otherwise, your device\'s default image app will be used.

You have configured Olvid to use automatic backups to a cloud provider, but your session has expired. You need to sign in to this provider again.\n\nIf you no longer want automatic backups, you can disable them in the App Settings. Keep in mind that automatic backups are the only way to prevent the loss of your contacts if your device is lost or damaged.
Clicking ADD CONTACT will add %1$s to your contacts.
Make sure the QR code you scanned was indeed presented to you by %1$s, directly on their device, from within the Olvid application.
%1$s is already part of your contacts.
%1$s is part of your list of known users but is not yet in your contacts.
Have %1$s scan this QR code to get in contact immediately.
This QR cannot be used to add %1$s to your contacts.\nPlease try again, making sure %1$s scans your QR code before you scan their\'s.
%1$s will be added to your contacts once their device can be reached.
Unable to query for installed browsers
Choose which browser to use for authentication
Request permission to access bluetooth devices
If you want to use a bluetooth headset for Olvid calls, you need to allow Olvid to \"find and connect to\" your nearby devices.

Your version of Olvid is outdated and needs to be updated.\n\nYou are probably missing out on many new features and we cannot guarantee the compatibility of your version with newer versions of the app that your contacts may use.
WARNING: some application customization could not be restored
It appears that some permissions required for Olvid\'s secure phone calls are permanently denied.\n\nPlease open the App Settings and manually allow Olvid to record audio and manage phone calls.

It appears that some permissions required for Olvid\'s secure video calls are permanently denied.\n\nPlease open the App Settings and manually allow Olvid to use camera, record audio and manage phone calls.

This missing message indicator tells you that a gap was detected in the numbering sequence of messages received from your contact.\n\nThis can either be that the sending of a message was cancelled (the message will never reach you), or that a larger message (typically with attachment) has not finished uploading yet (you should receive it soon).

Olvid\'s secure phone calls need the permission to record audio from your microphone.\nWe also recommend granting the permission to manage phone calls so that regular incoming phone calls can be handled properly.
Unable to update your identity provider signature key. Please try again.

Olvid detected a change in the cryptographic signature key of your identity provider. This should normally never happen.\n\nPlease contact your administrator and only press \"update key\" if he can confirm the key change was intentional. If unsure, press \"cancel\".

It seems that your account was removed from your company\'s identity provider. If you left your company, this is normal and you may continue using Olvid as a free user.\n\nIf you believe this is an error, please contact your administrator to re-register this identity provider with Olvid.

If you were to lose your device, or to uninstall Olvid by mistake, you would lose your Olvid ID, all your contacts, and all your groups 😱. Luckily for you, it is possible to setup secure backups 😅.\n\nPress \"Setup backups\" to begin.

In order not to lose any contact, we recommend you activate automatic backups to Google Drive. Don't worry, these backups are encrypted 🤓!
Otherwise, you may also perform manual backups on a regular basis.

Press "Setup backups" to begin.

It\'s been more than a week since your last backup. Now is probably a good time for a new one. Keep in mind that an old backup might not contain your latest contacts.\n\nPress \"Setup backups\" to begin.
Configuration link provided in the keycloak Olvid Management Console.
Set to \"true\" to prevent users from receiving a notification when a new version of Olvid is available on the store. This is especially useful if the application can only be updated through the MDM.
Pre-defined application settings configuration link. May be generated at https://olvid.io/settings
Setting this will enable automatic backups to a WebDAV server. This uri should be of the form https://username:password@webdavserver/path/
Set this to \"true\" if the automatic backup WebDAV only supports writing (no listing, downloading or deleting).
Encryption public key for backup key escrow on WebDAV
Set this to an RSA public key in PEM format. The backup key generated in Olvid will then be kept in escrow on the WebDAV server.
You are about to open a file with an external application. The content of this file will be exposed outside of Olvid.\nDo you wish to proceed?
Failed to unblock discussion, please try again

This discussion is locked because your contact was revoked by your company\'s identity provider. Their Olvid ID may have been compromised and the security of your communications cannot be guaranteed. Only unblock this discussion if you are sure that your contact\'s Olvid ID was never compromised.\nPlease contact your administrator for more details.
Contact revoked by your company\'s identity provider
Unable to write to selected folder
Some attachments could not be saved
Some attachments are not fully downloaded and could not be saved
When prompted, please select the folder in which to save this message\'s attachments.\nNote that access to some folders may be restricted.
Contact revoked by your company\'s identity provider

This contact was revoked by your company's identity provider. Their Olvid ID may have been compromised and the security of your communications cannot be guaranteed.

If you are sure your contact's Olvid ID was never compromised you may manually unblock them.
Please contact your administrator for more details.

This contact was revoked by your company's identity provider. Their Olvid ID may have been compromised and the security of your communications cannot be guaranteed.

You previously decided to manually unblock them. If you are unsure about your decision, it is recommended you re-block this contact.
Please contact your administrator for more details.

Your identity provider indicates that your Olvid ID was revoked, meaning it was potentially compromised. You cannot proceed with the configuration.\n\nPlease contact your administrator for more details.
Unable to load backup configuration. Please retry.
Notifications from your company\'s identity provider
Olvid needs you to authenticate with your company\'s identity provider.
Displays useful information while sharing your location
Olvid need to access your location to continue sharing
Olvid needs you to grant location access to continue sharing
Location sharing will restart when signal is back
You must have at least one visible profile

Hidden profiles are protected by a password and do not appear in you profile list until you enter this password.\nAccessing a hidden profile requires a long press on the \"add a profile\" button.\nIf you forget this password, you will permanently lose access to this profile!
Failed to create hidden profile password
You are about do discard the changes you made. In particular, the password you chose for this profile was not yet saved and will be lost.\nAre you sure you want to proceed?
You are about to un-hide a hidden Olvid profile. This profile will become visible to anyone opening your Olvid application.\nAre you sure you want to proceed?
You are about to hide an Olvid profile. If you forget the password you choose for this profile, you will permanently lose access to it.\nAre you sure you want to proceed?
Mute the whole profile instead of this discussion
Notify me when my name is mentioned
No policy set (hidden profile remains open)
When Olvid lock screen activates (requires a lock screen)
Choose when to close an open hidden profile

You chose to close any open hidden profile when the Olvid lock screen activates. However you have not yet configured a lock screen.\n\nIn the current setting, hidden profiles will only be closed when manually switching to another profile.
Close hidden profile when Olvid enters background…
No hidden profile closing policy defined

You have created a hidden profile but have not yet define when this profile should be closed.
Press OK to choose between the different policies offered by Olvid.

In the current setting, hidden profiles will only be closed when manually switching to another profile.

After several attempts, Olvid was unable to load your current backup configuration. If you already tried fully restarting Olvid/your device and you still get this error message, it is recommended you generate a new backup key.
Indicator that notifications are muted for this profile
The identity provider of your company was successfully configured. Press the \"authenticate\" button below to authenticate with it and retrieve your personal information.

Welcome to Olvid.

This installation is managed by your company and was configured to use an identity provider. Press the "authenticate" button below to authenticate with it and retrieve your personal information.

If you already used Olvid and want to restore your keys and contacts from a backup, press "restore a backup".
Choose the profile to be managed by your company\'s identity provider
Choose the profile to which to apply this configuration/license
Choose the profile to connect to the Olvid web client
Choose the profile with which to invite this contact
Please create a new profile first, then open this link again

Deleting a profile will delete any information related to this profile on your device. This includes, your contacts and groups and the content of all your discussions (messages and attachments) for this profile. Your other profiles will not be affected by this operation.
If you have enabled backups in Olvid, your future backups will not contain any trace of this profile and you may not be able to restore it.

Press "next" to choose how this profile should be deleted.

Deleting a profile will delete any information related to this profile on your device. This includes, your contacts and groups and the content of all your discussions (messages and attachments) for this profile.

This is your only visible profile and if you have any hidden profile, they will be deleted simultaneously.

If you have enabled backups in Olvid, your future backups will not contain any trace of this profile and you may not be able to restore it.

Press "next" to choose how this profile should be deleted.

Deleting a profile will delete any information related to this profile on your device. This includes, your contacts and groups and the content of all your discussions (messages and attachments) for this profile. Your other profiles will not be affected by this operation.\n\nPress \"next\" to choose how this profile should be deleted.

Deleting a profile will delete any information related to this profile on your device. This includes, your contacts and groups and the content of all your discussions (messages and attachments) for this profile.

This is your only visible profile and if you have any hidden profile, they will be deleted simultaneously.

Press "next" to choose how this profile should be deleted.

If you choose to delete your profile everywhere:
 - it will be deleted locally and on your contacts's devices
 - you will leave groups you joined
 - groups you manage will be disbanded

If you do not delete your profile everywhere it will only be deleted locally on your device. Unless you plan to restore a backup on another device, your contacts may still try sending you messages and might not realize these messages cannot be delivered.

Your current profile appears to be inactive, meaning you probably transferred it to another device. If you plan to continue using this profile on your other device, you can safely delete it here.\n\nIf you do not want to use this profile ever again, you will need to reactivate it on this device first, wait for secure channels with your contacts to be recreated, and only then delete this profile choosing the \"delete everywhere\" option.

Your profile is currently enable on multiple devices.

If you choose to delete your profile everywhere:
 - it will be deleted from all your devices and on your contacts's devices
 - you will leave groups you joined
 - groups you manage will be disbanded

If you do not delete your profile everywhere it will only be deleted locally and you can continue using it normally on your other devices.
Something went wrong, please try again

Your profile has been deactivated on this device. This is probably because you are using it on another device.\n\nPress \"reactivate my profile on this device\" to see which devices are currently active and how your profile can be reactivated on this device.

Olvid now supports having multiple completely independent profiles inside one app. Each profile can use a different name and profile picture and has a separate set of contacts, groups, and discussions. You may also have hidden profiles that require an additional password to be accessed.\n\nWant to try this out? Tap on your profile picture at the top left of the main screen and simply press \"add a profile\" to get started!
Show neutral notification when profile is hidden

When a profile is hidden, unless it is currently open in Olvid, you do not receive any notification for new messages. If you activate this option, an \"Olvid requires your attention\" notification will be displayed. You can then open Olvid and unlock your hidden profile to see new messages.\n\nWarning: this may disclose the fact that you indeed have a hidden profile.
Error: this password is used by another hidden profile
Icons below this line are never shown
When activated, if using a hardware keyboard, pressing \"Enter\" will send your message. \"Shift + Enter\" will add a new line
Colored dot on the \"i\" of the Olvid logo
Discreet line at the top of discussion list
Full connection status at the top of discussion list
Action shortcut to send a predefined message to a contact or group in one click
You have not created any widget yet
If you continue, this widget configuration will be deleted. You will still need to manually remove the widget from your home screen if this was not done already.
Long press to add/remove from favorites
When activated, the system font will be used for supported emoji caracters. Otherwise, the embedded font will be used.
The attachment %2$s is attached to %1$d different messages. Do you want to delete this one only, or do you want to delete it from all %1$d messages?\nThis action cannot be undone.
To have a private discussion with %1$s and add them to your contacts, press \"Invite\".
This user is not yet a contact
You invited %1$s to a private discussion. Please wait until they accept or press "Abort" to cancel this invitation.
The user you invited to a private discussion was removed from your known users list. You may press "Abort" to cancel this invitation.
%1$s invites you to a private discussion.
Removing %1$s from your contacts will end the private discussion you have with them. You will still be able to exchange messages within group discussions you have in common.
Show a \"trust origin\" indicator for contacts
When activated, a colored dot on their portrait indicates whether you personally verified a contact\'s identity or they were presented to you
Warning: using a shortcut widget with a hidden profile may disclose the existence of this profile.

Warning: using a shortcut widget with a hidden profile may disclose the existence of this profile.\nAs a bare minimum, you should configure a lock screen to restrict access to the widget configuration page.
This widget is using a hidden profile. Please enter this profile\'s password to configure it.

Message forwarding allows you to re-post one or several messages and their attachments in multiple discussions at once.\nMessages you received will be seen as sent by you, with the mention \"Forwarded\" and without mention of the original author.\nPress \"Proceed\" to select the discussions in which to forward these messages.
The messages you selected contain attachments that were not completely downloaded. These messages cannot be forwarded until the download is complete.

Some messages you selected contain attachments that were not completely downloaded. These messages cannot be forwarded until the download is complete.\n\nPress \"Proceed\" to forward only the messages that can be forwarded.
Click to download or erase cloud backups.

Automatic backups use a reserved space on Google Drive, only accessible to Olvid.

If you wish to proceed, you will be prompted to choose the Google account on which to save these backups.

Olvid will not have access to any of your files on Google Drive.
Press \"Switch account\" to select a cloud provider account
Error connecting to cloud provider: press \"Switch account\" to try again
Are you sur you want to delete the selected cloud backup? This action cannot be undone.\n\nPress \"OK\" to proceed.

Automatic backups periodically upload an encrypted backup of your keys and contacts to a cloud provider. By default, you can use your Google Drive account for this, but advanced users may configure a WebDAV server of their choice.

Automatic backups periodically upload an encrypted backup of your keys and contacts to a cloud provider. It appears your device does not have the required Google services to use Google Drive. You may still configure a WebDAV server of your choice.

Please choose the cloud provider from which you wish to restore a backup. By default, you can use your Google Drive account, but advanced users may configure a WebDAV server of their choice. Be sure to use the same account that was used to create this backup.

Please choose the cloud provider from which you wish to restore a backup. It appears your device does not have the required Google services to use Google Drive. You may still configure a WebDAV server of your choice. Be sure to use the same account that was used to create this backup.
Please choose the cloud provider on which you wish to manage Olvid backups.

In order to use this WebDAV server for automatic backups, Olvid will need to store the credentials you entered within its storage on your device. These credentials will not be accessible to other apps.\n\nPress \"OK\" to proceed.
No write access to selected cloud provider. Please check your server configuration
… additional search results available\nPlease refine your search
Activating this setting will enable a foreground service to run when a message is being sent. This may prevent the system from killing Olvid while an attachment is being uploaded.
Pinned discussions always remain at the top of your discussion list
Unable to display this user\'s name
Some settings are not available for locked discussions.
Custom message notifications for this discussion
Custom call notifications for this discussion
Personalized notifications for specific Olvid discussions.
The group is currently being synchronized. This screen will refresh once the update is complete.
Unable to update group. Your changes have been lost. Please try again.
You are currently the only administrator and cannot leave this group. If this group is no longer useful, you may want to disband it instead.

No other administrator has accepted to join this group yet, making you the only administrator. As such, you cannot leave the group. If this group is no longer useful, you may want to disband it instead.
Request to leave the group being processed

You are about to disband the group %1$s.
This will remove its %2$d members

Proceed with disbanding this group?
You cannot remove %1$s from your list of other users as both of you belong to\u0020
This group is currently being synchronized. Once this is done, you will be able to accept this invitation.
This group is currently being synchronized.

The group %1$s cannot be cloned because some members of this group use an outdated version of Olvid that does not support groups v2. Please let them know a newer version of Olvid is available!\n\nOutdated users:%2$s

The group %1$s contains members with whom you do not have a secure channel yet. You cannot invite them to the new group.

Affected users:%2$s

Do you wish to proceed with an incomplete group?
Location is currently disabled on your device. You need to enable it in the settings to continue.
Do you want to stop sharing your location?
You have to grant Olvid access to your location to use this feature.
You are about to open a location in an external app. This may expose this location to the map service provider.\nDo you wish to proceed?
By default, Android may generate reply suggestions and actions when receiving a new message notification. Disable this option to disable these suggestions.

Olvid does not currently have background location access. To work properly, continuous location sharing requires this permission. Otherwise the position will only be shared while the Olvid application is in foreground on your device.\n\nTo grant access to Olvid, press the "Open settings" button and select the "%1$s" option.

Olvid does not currently have background location access. To work properly, continuous location sharing requires this permission. Otherwise the position will only be shared while the Olvid application is in foreground on your device.\n\nTo proceed, press the "Grant access" button and select the "Allow all the time" option.
Do not use any map provider

It seems the Google Play Services are not installed on your device. They are required to use Google Maps integration. If you can\'t (or do not want to) install them, you may choose another map provider.
Hide all error notifications related to location sharing
When activated, entering a wrong PIN/password 3 times in a row will silently erase all read once and limited visibility messages.
Erase sensitive messages after 3 bad PINs

Activate this option to define an \"emergency\" PIN/password that unlocks the app, but silently erases all hidden profiles, read once and limited visibility messages. Entering this PIN will also deactivate this option.
Entering this emergency PIN in Olvid\'s lock screen will unlock Olvid, but silently erase any hidden profile you may have.
Are you sure you want to disable the emergency PIN you created?
Unlock password is a prefix of this emergency password
Unlock PIN is a prefix of this emergency PIN
Group members are currently being synchronized
All group members can invite new members
Only administrators can invite new members
Unleash the full power of Olvid groups!
You are now a group administrator
You are no longer a group administrator
You are now allowed to post messages
You can no longer post messages here
Block connections using an untrusted certificate
Olvid detected an untrusted SSL certificate
\u2023 Maintain a list of recent discussions:\u0020
\u2023 Show a \"trust origin\" indicator for contacts:\u0020
\u2023 Erase sensitive messages after 3 bad PINs:\u0020
\u2023 Keep WebClient running as a background task:\u0020
\u2023 Require unlock before each WebClient connection:\u0020
\u2023 Share app and OS version with Olvid:\u0020
\u2023 Notify when a server certifcate changes:\u0020
\u2023 Block connections using an untrusted certificate:\u0020
\u2023 Disable certificate change notification for link previews:\u0020
You took a screenshot of a sensitive message
An unknown user took a screenshot of a sensitive message
%1$s took a screenshot of a sensitive message
This group does not support more than one administrator. You can clone it into a new one that will\u00a0🚀!

Olvid now supports new groups with multiple administrators\u00a0👑! This does not change anything to your existing \"old groups\" but applies to all groups you create from now on. To benefit from this, your contacts need to use the latest version of Olvid.\n\nWant to try this out? Tap on the group tab and create a new group. Once created, you may edit it to grant administrator privilege to as many members as you wish!
[Message too large to display in web client]
Initiate secure calls\n(available through another profile)
Open this link in your browser?
Choosing a map provider allows to precisely pick the location you want to share on a map. However, this may disclose your location (or the location of your contacts) to this service provider.
This choice can be changed from the application settings

Olvid now allows mentioning a user in a discussion 🫵! Simply type @ followed by a letter or their name to see who can be mentioned.
In addition, when muting 💤 a discussion or a profile, you can now choose to only be notified when you are explicitly mentioned in a message.

Note that your contacts will need to update to the latest version of Olvid to actually see you mentioned them.
Disable certificate change notification for link previews

Enable this option to disable certificate change detection when fetching a link preview. Some sites may present a different certificate at each connection and you may get frequent notifications with this option off.
Use legacy ZXing library for QR code scanning
By default, ML Kit is used for QR code scanning. Enable this option if you have issues scanning QR codes from within Olvid.
By default, PDF attachments are opened in an external viewer. Enable this option to use the (basic) internal viewer instead.
This message was sent from another devices. Please use that device to access the detailed message delivery status.
Please enter the name you want to use to identify your current device.\nPress \"default\" to use its default device name.
Please enter the name you want to use to identify that device.
If you remove a device, your Olvid profile will be deactivated on that device. You can still use Olvid normally on your other devices.

You currently do not have a license to have multiple active devices. If you wish to purchase such a license, close this dialog and press \"See subscription plans\" below.\n\nTo continue and keep device \"%1$s\" active, device \"%2$s\" will de deactivated instead. Do you wish to proceed?

Olvid now allows formatting your messages using markdown syntax 🎨!

Write in **bold**, in *italic*, add # HEADINGS, etc.

Find the list of all supported tags 🦍 at:
https://www.olvid.io/faq/format-your-messages/
Failed to reactivate current device, please try again.
License was rejected by the server
Your profile is currently inactive. Activating a license can only be done on an active profile.
When activated, only group admins can post messages in this group
I already have an Olvid profile
I am a new Olvid user
What would you like to do?
Where is your backup file located?
A profile picture is worth a thousand words
Give a name to this device
This will help you distinguish between your devices. Device names are only visible to you.
Enter this code on your new device

Start Olvid on your new device.\nIf this device has no profile yet, follow the instructions to import an existing profile.\nOtherwise, tap your profile picture at the top left and select \"Add a profile\".
Enter the code displayed on your new device
Enter the code displayed on your other device

Start Olvid on your other device.
Tap your profile picture at the top left.
Select the profile you want to import and tap the"Manage" button.
Tap "Add a device" to display the code.
Enter this code on your other device
Here is your current device list
Choose which device you wish to keep active
Other devices will be deactivated within 30 days
Import a profile from another device
Choose this if you have access to another device where your profile is currently active
Requires a backup file and the corresponding backup key
Add a new profile on this device
A new device was added to one of your Olvid profiles
Your Olvid device \"%1$s\" will be deactivated within %2$s
Your Olvid device will be deactivated within %1$s

Adding a device allows to easily transfer your profile to a new device or, if you have a multi-device licence, to receive messages on both devices simultaneously. **Only add devices that you trust!**\n\nMake sure you have a **stable internet connection** on both devices before you proceed.
If you have other profiles, would you like to import them too?
Ready to add your profile on a new device?
This new device will remain active
The device below will remain active:
Changing the group type will significantly change the permissions of the members below.
This is a write-only WebDAV. Listing is not possible.

Automatic backups are currently configured by your device administrator. An error occurred while uploading your latest backup, which could mean this configuration is no longer valid.\n\nIf this problem persists, please contact your administrator.
Backups configured by your device administrator
Automatic backups are currently configured by your device administrator and cannot be disabled. If you believe this is an error, please contact your administrator.
Your backup key is not safely stored in escrow

Your device administrator has configured automatic key escrow for your Olvid backup key. However your current key is not safely stored yet.\n\nPlease press \"open settings\" and generate a new backup key. If not sure about what to do, please contact your administrator.
To be notified when a contact sends you a message, you need to allow Olvid to display notifications.
Notifications are currently disabled for Olvid. Unless you enable them, you will not be notified when receiving a message from your contacts.
Granting Olvid access to the camera allows you to send pictures taken directly from within Olvid, or to scan the ID of other users.
Granting Olvid access to the microphone allows you to record voice messages and is required to start or receive secure calls.
Enabling your location allows you to use the \"share your location\" feature.
Granting Olvid access to your location allows you to use the \"share your location\" feature.

Battery optimization on Android works by delaying certain background events to run them in a batch. This may delay the reception of inbound Olvid messages and calls.\n\nOlvid is currently allowed to \"always run in background\".

Battery optimization on Android works by delaying certain background events to run them in a batch. This may delay the reception of inbound Olvid messages and calls.\n\nTo ensure that your messages are received promptly, you should allow Olvid to \"always run in background\".
Olvid needs to be allowed to run in background to function properly. Enabling background restriction would, for example, prevent Olvid from receiving messages in the background.

Olvid has \"background restriction\" enabled. Olvid will not be able to function properly until you remove it from the \"restricted apps\" list.\n\nYou can fix this by pressing \"App settings\" and heading to the battery usage section.
Olvid relies on alarms to precisely schedule screen lock and ephemeral messages deletion. This permission is set correctly.

Olvid relies on alarms to precisely schedule screen lock and ephemeral messages deletion.
The permission to set such alarms has been revoked, which may cause these security features to misbehave.

We strongly encourage you to allow setting alarms and reminders by pressing "App settings".
Incoming calls need to display a full screen \"answer call\" notification. This permission is set correctly.

Incoming calls need to display a full screen \"answer call\" notification. Olvid currently does not have permission to open such full screen notifications. Press \"App settings\" to allow full scrren notifications.
Permanent WebSocket connection to Olvid\'s servers is properly configured.

Google Play Services are not available on your device. Olvid relies on these services to be notified of incoming messages. Without them, you will only receive new messages when Olvid is in the foreground.\n\nYou may instead enable a permanent WebSocket connection to Olvid\'s servers that can serve the same purpose (but may slightly drain your battery).
%1$s storage space available on your device.

Only %1$s storage space left on your device.

Your device is running low on available space. Expect to run into unexpected errors when receiving or sending files with Olvid.

This is probably the right time to free up some space on your device.
Need help with Olvid? Please read our FAQ:

Olvid backups are properly setup. Please make sure you know where your backup key is and check that you have access to up to date backup files.\n\nIt is a good idea to verify your backup key from time to time, just to be sure you\'ll know what to do if you lose your device 😅.
Want to improve your Olvid experience?
Do you want all your devices to remain active?

Olvid is now available for **your computer** (Windows and macOS). You can download the latest version from:
https://olvid.io/download/

With the **multi-device** support, start a conversation on your phone and continue it on your computer. Sharing files between your devices and with your contacts has never been easier!
Do you want to invite %1$s to a private discussion?
Group members that are not yet contacts will appear here.
Keep track of remote deleted messages
When activated, messages that are \"deleted everywhere\" by someone else leave a marker in the discussion.
Delete all remote deleted message markers?
Read once messages and attachments are displayed once and are deleted when closing the discussion.
Defines how long the message will be displayed when the user reads it.
Time after which the message is deleted, whether it was read or not.
You may only use more restrictive settings than the discussion\'s default.
Sometimes only show a first name
When activated, your contact\'s first name may be shown instead of their full name for a more compact display.

Please enter the URL of the **style file** you want to use for OpenStreetMap. This URL should be something like: *https://map.olvid.io/styles/osm.json*\n\nNote that the tile server referenced in this file may learn some information about your position. Be sure to **use a server you trust**.
Use a custom reverse address server
Address lookup allows getting the street address of a location being shared.

Olvid only supports **Pelias** servers for address lookup. Please enter the URL of the server you want to query below, it should be something like *https://pelias.olvid.io*, and queries will be sent to the */v1/reverse* entry point.\n\nNote that this server may learn some information about your position. Be sure to **use a server you trust**.
Do you want to force a restart of Olvid?
When activated, messages indicating that a group member joined or left a group will not be displayed in your discussions.
Video calls are limited to %1$d participants
Would you like your contacts to know when you read their messages?
Tired of the classic blue Olvid icon? Try something different!
The name and icon of the application will be modified on your home screen. This does not apply to notifications icon.
Please note that changing the app icon will delete the discussion shortcuts you have created. You will need to recreate them.
Delete from the devices of all participants
Delivered to all message recipients (only if there are multiple recipients)
Delivered to all recipients and read by at least one
Could not be sent to some recipients
Sent from another of your devices
Contact offline for an extended period of time
It seems this contact has not used Olvid for an extended period of time. We cannot guarantee messages will be properly delivered to them.

Olvid was not able to detect any browser on your device.

If **no browser is currently installed** you must install one before you can authenticate.

If you have a browser installed, Android may not have properly granted Olvid the permission to list browsers. **Restarting your device** may solve the issue.
Display all links in message body
Unless activated, messages containing a single link and a link preview will only display the preview, not the link text.

Unfortunately, your authentication failed.

A possible reason could be an offset of **more than 10 minutes** between your device's clock and the server's clock.

Please check that your device's time, date, and time zone are accurate and try authenticating again.

*If the problem persists, please contact your administrator.*
Comma-separated list of alternate TURN sever URLs to use for Olvid audio and video calls. Username and password must also be provided in other MDM fields.
The username to use for authentication with the alternate TURN sever.
The password to use for authentication with the alternate TURN sever.
Your company requires you to authenticate with their identity provider on your new device to access your profile.
This ensures that only authorized devices can access your profile.

Your company requires additional authentication: you will need to authenticate with their identity provider directly on this new device.\n\n**If your new device does not prompt you to authenticate, please make sure it is running the latest version of Olvid.**
Your company\'s identity provider is not reachable
Please authenticate with your company\'s identity provider to proceed.
Your Olvid ID is currently managed by your company\'s identity provider which restricts transfers. It can not be changed at your initiative.\n\nPlease contact your administrator for more details.
After an application crash, internal databases might have consistency issues. Run this check to ensure everything is fine 😁
When do you want your discussions to be unarchived?
You can modify the notifications behavior in each discussion settings
When this is on, archived discussions attachments will be automatically downloaded according to above setting.
When this is on, archived discussions are automatically unarchived when a new message notification is received.
